# Aptos Wallet Adapter for Bitget Wallet

Bitget Wallet Aptos Dapp Doc [https://web3.bitget.com/zh-CN/docs/provider-api/aptos.html](https://web3.bitget.com/zh-CN/docs/provider-api/aptos.html)

This repo provides an adapter for Bitget Wallet based on [https://github.com/aptos-labs/aptos-wallet-adapter](aptos-wallet-adapter)
